example.parse: (IP (IP-ADV (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 看) (NP-OBJ (PN 他)) (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VP (DVP (VP (VA 随兴)) (DEV 地)) (VP (VV 拍拍打打))) (PU ，) (VP (VV 接合) (NP-OBJ (NN 罐身))))))) (PU ，) (IP-ADV (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (ADVP (AD 仔细)) (ADVP (AD 一)) (VP (VV 看)))) (PU ，) (NP-SBJ (QP (CD 一) (CLP (M 环))) (ADJP (JJ 正)) (NP (NN 方格纹))) (VP (VP (ADVP (AD 已)) (VP (VV 烙印) (PP (P 在) (NP (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (IP (NP-TPC (NN 罐身)) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (ADVP (AD 最)) (VP (VA 宽阔))))) (NP (NN 处))))))))
example.arg: 一 环 正 方格纹
